options.text: Beeswax- Used in the preparation of cosmetics and polishes.
Mule- It is the result of mating between the male and female animals of two different species.
Hilsa, Sardines and Mackerel- Some of the marine fishes that are eaten in our country.
Inbreeding - Inbreeding refers to the mating of related individuals of closely related breeds.

solution.text:
Inbreeding: Breeding between the animals of the same breed having common ancestors on either side of their pedigree for 4–6 generations.

Out-breeding: It is of following types.
A. Out-crossing - Breeding between the unrelated animals, which may be of the same breed but having no common ancestors on either side of their pedigree for 4–6 generations.

B. Cross-breeding: Breeding of animals of different breeds of the same species.

C. Inter-specific hybridization: Breeding of animals of different species.
